ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 32 DSP units x 312 ops/unit/clock = 9,984 INT8 ops/clock (HVX + HTA combined)
ops_per_clock_notes.note: Hexagon 698 with 4x HVX 1024-bit SIMD + HTA tensor accelerator. Based on Snapdragon 865.

theoretical_peaks_notes: 15 TOPS INT8 peak @ 1.5 GHz (marketing claim). Sustained @ 7W is ~5-6 TOPS due to thermal throttling.
notes: Qualcomm Dragonwing Robotics Platform (RB5). Hexagon 698 DSP with HVX SIMD + HTA tensor accelerator. 7nm TSMC. LPDDR5 @ 44 GB/s. For robotics, drones, edge AI. Sustained ~5-6 TOPS INT8 @ 7W.
